1 1/2 cups Flour; 1 tsp Baking Powder; 1/2 cup Butter; 1 cup Sugar; 5 Eggs; 1/2 tsp Vanilla; 2 cups Milk; 1 can Sweetened Condensed Milk; 1 1/2 cups Heavy Whipping Cream; 1 cup Strawberries

2 1/2 cups Whole Wheat Flour; 1 tbsp Sugar (optional); 1 tsp Salt; 1 cup (2 sticks) Cold Unsalted Butter, cut into small cubes; 1/2 cup Ice Water; 2 cups Fresh Strawberries, hulled and sliced; 3 cups Fresh Rhubarb, chopped; 1/2 cup Honey or Maple Syrup; 1/4 cup Cornstarch or Arrowroot Powder; 1 tsp Vanilla Extract; 1 tbsp Lemon Juice; 1 tsp Ground Cinnamon; 1 tsp Nutmeg; Pinch of Salt; 1 tsp Cloves

1 lb Chicken Breast; 1 tsp Italian Seasoning; Kosher Salt; Black Pepper; 8 ounces Penne Pasta; 2 tbsp Extra Virgin Olive Oil; 1/2 cup Heavy Cream; 1/4 cup Parmesan Cheese; 1/4 cup Sun-Dried Tomatoes; 1/2 cup Basil Pesto; 1/2 to 1 tsp Red Pepper Flakes; Handful of Torn Basil Leaves

5 Roma Tomatoes; 4 stalks Celery; 2 cups Orzo; 4 cups Vegetable Broth; 1 tbsp Fresh Basil; 1 tsp Oregano; 1 tsp Italian Seasoning; Pinch of Salt; Pinch of Pepper; 1 tsp Flour (to taste); 1 tbsp Minced Garlic; 1/2 Diced Onion
